title: Seiberg–Witten invariants
summary: In mathematics, and especially gauge theory, Seiberg–Witten invariants are invariants of compact smooth oriented 4-manifolds introduced by Edward Witten (1994), using the Seiberg–Witten theory studied by Nathan Seiberg and  Witten (1994a, 1994b) during their investigations of Seiberg–Witten gauge theory.
